content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond
inventory=[{"type": "poppy", "quantity": 43, "index": 18}, {"type": "blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "player_head", "quantity": 13, "index": 37}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft diamond. Diamond requires placing 1 diamond_block in the crafting grid, therefore I will first need to move the diamond_block from slot 40 into the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 40 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond
inventory=[{"type": "diamond", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "poppy", "quantity": 43, "index": 18}, {"type": "blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "player_head", "quantity": 13, "index": 37}]
thought: Since the diamond_block has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the diamond to the inventory.
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9
